Remarks: One of only 9 condos in the building's preferred southeast tier. this 2,146 sqft Trump Tower condo offers breathtaking views of the city skyline, Chicago River and Lake Michigan. It is located on the building's transition floor with 11 foot ceilings, significantly taller than standard! The over-sized combo living/dining room includes floor-to-ceiling windows, hardwood floors, a fireplace and new recessed art lighting. The roomy eat-in kitchen is outfitted with Snaidero cabinetry and Wolf and Miele appliances. The master suite has two walk-in closets and a stunning en suite bath. In addition to a 2nd bedroom and full bath, there is a powder room for guests. The price includes a deeded garage space; a second 2-car tandem space is available for $60k. Renowned for great service, building amenities include an attentive staff, a health club, spa, lap pool, and concierge as well as the services offered by the hotel. This building is central to downtown, Millennium Park and the river walk!
